messages.title: New measure to reduce the risk of Cancer
messages.content: Julie with the support of cancer charities campaigned in Parliament to ban the use of sun beds by under-16's.

messages.title: Protecting front-line services, protecting the NHS
Creating a future that is fair for all
messages.content: Strong families are the heart of strong communities. We know that hard decisions will have to be made in the coming months. In Cardiff North the choice is between a Labour government that cares about the community and a Tory government through difficult times attacking services and taking us back to the high unemployment of the 80s. It is a straight choice between Labour and the Tories.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign to reduce the risk of cancer, including a ban on the use of sun beds by under-16's.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In Cardiff North the choice is between Labour and the Tories.

issues.governance: Strong families are the heart of strong communities.
issues.health: New measure to reduce the risk of Cancer championed by Julie.

housing.content: Creating a future that is fair for all includes strong families as the heart of strong communities.

Julie and community members discussing issues.
